title: Raspberry Pi
description: The Raspberry Pi is a credit-card sized computer that plugs into a computer monitor or TV, and uses a standard keyboard and mouse.

title: Arduino Uno
description: The Arduino Uno is a microcontroller board based on the ATmega328

title: DHT11 Sensor
description: The DHT11 is a basic, ultra low-cost digital temperature and humidity sensor

title: IR Sensor
description: An infrared sensor is an electronic instrument that is used to sense certain characteristics of its surroundings

title: Bluetooth Module
description: HC-05 module is an easy to use Bluetooth SPP module, designed for transparent wireless serial connection setup
